org.neo4j.logging

Class AbstractPrintWriterLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.logging.AbstractPrintWriterLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger

    public abstract class AbstractPrintWriterLogger
extends Object
implements Logger
    An abstract Logger implementation, which takes care of locking and flushing.

      • bulk

        public void bulk(Consumer<Logger> consumer)
        Description copied from interface: Logger
        Used to temporarily write several messages in bulk. The implementation may choose to disable flushing, and may also block other operations until the bulk update is completed.
        Specified by:
        bulk in interface Logger
        Parameters:
        consumer - A callback operation that accepts an equivalent Logger
